snippet: Seamus Daly has been charged with the murders of 29 people in a car bombing in Omagh, Northern Ireland.
abstract: Seamus Daly, dissident Irish Republican charged with 29 counts of murder the 1998 car bombing in Omagh, Northern Ireland, is ordered held without bail.
lead_paragraph: Seamus Daly has been charged with the murders of 29 people in a car bombing in Omagh, Northern Ireland.

headline.main: Irish Republican Ordered Held Without Bail in 1998 Bombing Case
headline.print_headline: Northern Ireland: Suspect Denied Bail After Being Charged in 1998 Bombing
